last_episode_to_air.name: Detention
last_episode_to_air.overview: Count Dregon sends Maggots to implant the Brain Mite in Dex's mind. It will stab the Masked Rider's brain and take control of his arms and legs. Dex can't control himself! Can the powers of Masked Rider crack the Brain Mite before it scrambles his mind?

name: Masked Rider
overview:
Masked Rider is an American adaptation of the Japanese television series Kamen Rider Black RX, the ninth in a line of series in the popular Kamen Rider Series franchise. It was produced by Saban and aired on FOX part of the Fox Kids program block from September 16, 1995 to August 31, 1996 and then in syndication from September 9, 1996 to September 1997.

Like the early seasons of Power Rangers and VR Troopers, Masked Rider's battle and villain scenes were taken from Japanese stock footage â€“ specifically Kamen Rider Black RX, Episodes also occasionally had Ferbus interact with Combat Chopper and Magno but also the two Japanese Kamen Rider movies Kamen Rider ZO and Kamen Rider J.

episodes.name: Escape From Edenoi (1)
episodes.overview: As Dex and his friends continue the fight to free Edenoi, Count Dregon sets his sights on Earth and sends down the powerful Destructosphere. When Dex learns of Dregon's plans, he travels to Earth to stop him and is taken in by the Stewart family before the battle begins.

episodes.name: Escape From Edenoi (2)
episodes.overview: Dex battles the Destructosphere, but he finds his Masked Rider powers aren't going to be enough against Count Dregon's forces. Taking King Lexian's advice, Dex uses his powers to create the Combat Chopper and Magno to aid him in the fight. Meanwhile, a group of Nefaria's Maggots attack Leawood High.

episodes.name: License to Thrill
episodes.overview: Dex is ready to start driving, but he gets a big surprise when his instructor is revealed to be a disguised Insectivore.

episodes.name: Pet Nappers
episodes.overview: The Stewart family prepares for an alien attack.  Then, Count Dregon sends Nefaria to recruit a couple burglars.  Now, Ferbus is in danger of being kidnapped.  Can our hero protect his friend?

episodes.name: Bugs on the Loose
episodes.overview: Count Dregon plans to turn the Stewart family into insect warriors.  Now, Ferbus must find Dex fast before    Dregon's evil plan starts to bug the Stewart family.  Then, Dex must summon his team.  Can our hero save the Stewarts    from Dregon's threat?

episodes.name: Arcade Ace
episodes.overview: A video wiz at the Cosmos has Albee bummed.  So, Dex faces off with the arcade ace.  Then, while Ferbus discovers    bananas, Dregon sends a monster to Earth.  Can our hero stop Count Dregon's monster?

episodes.name: Super Gold (1)
episodes.overview: Lexion sends Denais on a mission to Earth.  Then, he's kidnapped by Maggots, and turned into the evil Robo Rider.  Can our hero rescue his friend?

episodes.name: Super Gold (2)
episodes.overview: Donais, having come to Earth to give Dex the added power of Masked Rider Super Gold, is now his friend's enemy, the Robo Rider. Can our hero battle his own friend, and reverse the power of the crystal?

episodes.name: The Grandma Factor
episodes.overview: The Stewarts' Grandma drops by for a visit.  Meanwhile, Count Dregon sends his own visitors, who kidnap Grandma.  Can our    hero save Grandma from a pair of monsters?

episodes.name: Something's Trashy
episodes.overview: The kids start a clean-up campaign in Leawood and it's just another day at the office for Count Dregon.  Then, Nefaria supervises a little cleaning herself.  This gives Cyclopter another idea for an evil monster.  Can our hero stop the monster?

episodes.name: Water Water Everywhere
episodes.overview: The Stewarts plan a day at the pool and Count Dregon plans a way to defeat the Masked Rider and rule the world. While the kids enjoy the water and Ferbus enjoys thehot dogs, the enemy begins his evil plan.  Can our hero stop it?

episodes.name: Ferbus' First Christmas
episodes.overview: It's Christmas time and a homesick Dex learns more about the holiday. Meanwhile, Count Dregon's crew plots to ruin things for everyone by having Nefaria sneak Maggots into the Stewart house to kidnap Santa Claus. Can Dex's Masked Rider powers save Christmas?

episodes.name: Stranger from the North
episodes.overview: A student from another country visits Leawood High.  While the young visitor gets a tour, Count Dregon prepares a   new threat for our hero.  Now, the Masked Rider must battle Dregon's new monster.  Can our hero stop his evil plan?

episodes.name: Dance Crazy
episodes.overview: The kids catch dance fever.  Meanwhile, Count Dregon plans to defeat the Masked Rider with an all-new Insectivore.   While the dancers compete for the big prize, Count Dregon has a big surprise for our hero.  Can he stop the enemy's    evil threat?

episodes.name: The Green-Eyed Monster
episodes.overview:
The kids enjoy a day of dirt bike racing and Ferbus enjoys a few treats.  Then, Ferbus is left behind and Dex    goes looking for him.  But, Count Dregon has a surprise for our hero.  Can he defeat Dregon's evil forces?

Also, Chopper gets over his jealousy of Dex riding another motorcycle real fast when Dregon creates a tractor beam strong enough to transport Dex to the Spiderbase and into his evil clutches.  It's up to Magno and Chopper to rescue Dex before Dregon discovers a way to steal his powers.

episodes.name: The Heat is On
episodes.overview: A heat wave hits the city, making Ferbus get sick.  The evil Heliotoid is to blame. Can our hero cool things off?

episodes.name: Know Your Neighbor
episodes.overview: The Stewarts become contestants on a hit TV show.  Now, Count Dregon is steamin' mad and Maggots are sent to    the studio to stop the show.  But, the show must go on.  Can our hero stop the Maggots?

episodes.name: The Dash
episodes.overview: Dex is running a little late, and Mr. Chalmers and  the Coach discuss the state track championship.  Then,  "somebody special" flies by.  Count Dregon hatches a evil plan.  Can our hero Dex save the day?

episodes.name: Battle of the Bands
episodes.overview: Dex, Molly and Albee enter a battle of the bands competition and begin rehearsing. But Dex has bigger things to worry about when he has to fight the Blue-Fanged Louse, an energy absorbing monster.

episodes.name: Ferbus Maximus
episodes.overview: After a dubial showdown between Cyclopter and the    Masked Rider, Count Dregon considers Nefaria's next evil    plan.  When Ferbus takes a bite, strange things begin   to happen.  Can this evil spell on Ferbus be reversed?   and can are hero Dex save the day again????

episodes.name: Unmasked Rider
episodes.overview: Patsy becomes suspicious of Dex, which gives Count Dregon an excellent idea. Then, Nefaria has a plan. And King Lexian sends Donais on a mission, bring the powers of Super Blue to Dex. Can our hero prevail against Dregon's evil forces?

episodes.name: Ferbus' Day Out
episodes.overview: The family is going out to a restaurant to celebrate Hal and Barbara's wedding anniversary, but Ferbus can't come and is left alone at the house. He accidentally locks himself out and gets chased by dog catchers. Meanwhile, Dex has to battle a new monster and Double Face, who is armed with the powerful Super Sword.

episodes.name: Jobless
episodes.overview: Our hero seeks gainful employment. The job search is tough, until he lands a gig at the arcade. But Count Dregon unleashes a scheme to stop the new employee. Can our hero take the fizzle out of Count Dregon's plan?

episodes.name: Back to Nature
episodes.overview: The family goes camping and Count Dregon uses the opportunity to launch an attack. The Water Bug is sent to attempt to blow up Leawood Bay Bridge to lure Dex into a trap. Meanwhile, a scientist in the woods catches Ferbus, thinking he's a baby sasquatch.

episodes.name: Testing 1, 2, 3
episodes.overview: Nefaria sets into a motion a scheme to ruin Masked Rider's secret identity, by tricking Principal Chalmers into studying Dex's homelife, trying to determine what makes him such an exceptionial student. When his repeated testing fails to expose Dex, Dregon sends down Gork and Fleazoid to attack the city.

episodes.name: Showdown at Leawood High
episodes.overview: One tough student arrives at school, named Big Bubba! Now, Herbie and Dex must show the new kid around, while Count Dregon sends his own new kid to school. Can both bullies be stopped at once?

episodes.name: Power Out
episodes.overview: An explosion in Leawood Canyon leads Dex into a trap, where the Boulder Beetle monster begins to sap the Masked Rider powers out of him via negative proton rays. If that's not bad enough, Doubleface has a War Saber and a Reptosect monster waiting to finish him off, and Dex is missing Albee's recital!

episodes.name: Saturday Morning Invasion
episodes.overview: Count Dregon discovers alien competition. Can our hero defeat Count Dregon and his new titan of terror?

episodes.name: Passenger Ferbus
episodes.overview: It's Grandma's 75th Birthday, and she's sent Dex's family airline tickets to come celebrate with her. Once he's aboard the    plane, Dex won't be able to leave without revealing his identity, so Count Dregon sends down an Insectivore to enslave the Earthlings. Will Dex be able to transform and defeat the enemy in time?

episodes.name: Mixed Doubles
episodes.overview: Count Dregon's plan to defeat our hero includes cloning the entire Stewart Family, and then cloning himself. Is this a new form of family value, or is Count Dregon just cloning around?

episodes.name: Million Dollar Ferbus
episodes.overview: Albee puts Ferbus' name on a winning sweepstakes ticket. Meanwhile, Count Dregon has met his match. Can our hero beat the powerful Lavasect?

episodes.name: Ectophase Albee
episodes.overview: A backyard stumble transfers Masked Rider's powers to Albee. So Count Dregon and Nefaria send Manosect to battle our young hero. Can Albee use Masked Rider's powers to defeat Dregon's monster?

episodes.name: Race Against Time
episodes.overview: The action moves into high gear! Count Dregon gives Albee a present, a car that cannot lose: the Revenator! He leads Dregon's forces to Dex's cave, where they plan to destroy Magno & Chopper. Can the Masked Rider put the brakes on this motor monster?

episodes.name: Cat-Atomic
episodes.overview: Cheerleading tryouts are coming up, and Molly is unsure about trying out. Count Dregon wants to transform the Leawood Lions mascot into Catatron. Can the Masked Rider face his ferocious feline fury before it mashes Molly's chances?

episodes.name: Indigestion
episodes.overview: Count Dregon cooks up a malicious meal, and it's fed to Dex. His worst nightmare is about to begin! Can the Masked Rider digest this dilemma?

episodes.name: Dex at Bat
episodes.overview: A banana and a monster become the key to a mystery. Our hero must brave a haunted house, and a strange & frightening beast. Count Dregon gives the Stewarts a big, hairy problem. Masked Rider will have to give up his powers or see Leawood destroyed. Will our hero get a banana split?

episodes.name: The Invasion of Leawood
episodes.overview: Count Dregon unveils a dastardly plot. Unless Masked Rider surrenders to him in less than an hour, Leawood will cease to exist! King Lexian tells Dex that there is a small hope, the legacy of Masked Rider Warriors. Can our hero stop Count Dregon?

episodes.name: The Eye of Edenoi
episodes.overview: Count Dregon gives our hero the evil eye. Dex tells the legend of the Ocusect, how any Edenoite that looks at the eye in the middle of its forehead, is frozen with fear, forever. Dregon plans to use his own Ocusect to trick Dex into being pulled inside its eye, where he can take his Masked Rider powers. Is our hero in the eye of the storm?

episodes.name: Exit Nefaria, Enter Barbaria
episodes.overview: There's mutiny on Spiderbase! Count Dregon unleashes an evil kidnapping scheme, turning Barbara Stewart into Nefaria's replacement. Can the Masked Rider save his mother from the clutches of Count Dregon?

episodes.name: Detention
episodes.overview: Count Dregon sends Maggots to implant the Brain Mite in Dex's mind. It will stab the Masked Rider's brain and take control of his arms and legs. Dex can't control himself! Can the powers of Masked Rider crack the Brain Mite before it scrambles his mind?
